sourcesContent:
import { Box, Button, useTheme } from "@mui/material";
import Header from "../../components/Header";
import { tokens } from "../../theme";

const LiquidTanks = ({ waterLevel, onPumpToggle }) => {
  const theme = useTheme();
  const colors = tokens(theme.palette.mode);

  return (
    <Box m="20px">
      <Header title="Tanks" subtitle="All liquid holding tanks" />
      <Box
        m="40px 0 0 0"
        height={500} // Outer box height
        width={500} // Outer box width
        display="flex" // Corrected display property
        alignItems="flex-end" // Aligns inner box to the bottom
        justifyContent="center" // Center items horizontally
        border="1px solid" // Optional: Add a border around the outer box
        borderColor={colors.grey[300]} // Border color
        borderRadius="8px" // Rounded corners for the outer box
      >
        <Box
          bgcolor={"darkBlue"} // Use theme color for background
          color={"White"} // Set text color
          height={`${waterLevel}%`} // Height based on water level percentage
          width="100%" // Full width of the container
          borderRadius="8px" // Rounded corners for the inner box
          boxShadow={3} // Add some shadow
          textAlign="center" // Center text inside the box
          display="flex" // Use flexbox for inner box
          alignItems="center" // Center text vertically
          justifyContent="center" // Center text horizontally
        >
          Water Level: {waterLevel.toFixed(2)}%
        </Box>
      </Box>
      <Box display="flex" justifyContent="center" mt="20px">
        <Button 
          color={waterLevel > 0 ? "primary" : "error"} // Change button color based on state
          variant="contained" 
          onClick={onPumpToggle}
        >
          {waterLevel > 0 ? "Run Pump" : "No Water Left"}
        </Button>
      </Box>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default LiquidTanks;
